BigHole:
Big Hole River
The river is in great shape and fishing has been solid.
Dries:
#16-#20 Purple Haze, #16-#18 Rocky Mountain Mint, #8-#10 October Caddis
Nymphs:
Pat’s Stone #4-#12, Lightning Bugs – Silver & Gold & Black #14-#18; Superflash Pheasant Tails #14-#18; Golden Stone Nymphs #8-#12, #14 Copper Johns: Red, Chartreuse, Copper, SJ Worms, Caddis Pupa, Golden Stone Nymphs #8-#12, #18-#20 Zebra Midge
Streamers:
Scully Bugger, Sculpzilla, Lil Kim, Sparkle Minnow, Yellow/White/Black Boogy Man, Wooly bugger
Streamflows for The Big Hole
